product_name: REI Fleet Long Shorts - Women's Plus Sizes
long_description: The women's REI Fleet Long Shorts in plus sizes feature performance fabrics that let you comfortably keep to your training schedule. Shorts feature a 4-way-stretch polyester/spandex blend that's soft and dries quickly. Fabric also provides UPF 50+ sun protection. Stretchy crepe liner brief wicks moisture to keep you comfortable; fabric in liner brief is recycled. Elastic waistband with drawcord fine-tunes the fit. Zippered rear pocket for essentials; envelope pocket on the liner brief to hold your key. Reflective trim increases visibility in low light. The women's REI Fleet Long Shorts in plus sizes have an active fit that provides for a full range of motion.
short_description: The women's REI Fleet Long Shorts in plus sizes feature performance fabrics that let you comfortably keep to your training schedule.
